metadata.title: kernel: crypto: xilinx - call finalize with bh disabled (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:

crypto: xilinx - call finalize with bh disabled

When calling crypto_finalize_request, BH should be disabled to avoid
triggering the following calltrace:
